scenario_text.value: Take...THIS!

Hah! You call that an attack? That was
nothing!
Grr... Unbelievable! How strong is this guy?!
Oh no! Kaito!

So, you ARE worried about what happens to
him?
Of course I am! He’s my brother!

I just don’t like him being overprotective,
and I hate how he never gives me any space.

When he gets like that, it reminds me of...
things I really don’t want to remember.
And that’s why you were so mean to him?
Yeah, but he’s still my brother.
Only I can’t do anything...
Your Majesty! Your Majesty must stay here!
Don’t worry! We’ll go help them!
What?!
Attaaack!!!
Bah! Enough!!!
Oh no! They’re all hurt again!
Shakomon, tell me, what should I do?

They’re all fighting for me like I’m really
their queen, but...
I haven’t done anything for them!
Miu...what do you want to do?

I... I don’t want to let anyone... To let my
brother die...

I don’t want to lose everyone after lying to
them, or my brother after fighting with him!
I want to protect everyone else for a change!
Shakomon, please! Save Kaito!

Oh, I’m so happy you said that! Finally you
were able to be honest about how you feel.
Shakomon?!

I’ve been waiting this whole time for you to
be honest with me.

Because when you wish for something with your
whole heart, I can be as strong as you need!
What?! Shakomon, what’s happening?!

Miu, I’m here to make your wishes come true!
So for your sake, I’ll grow strong!
Shakomon, evolve...!
